Project: cargo-fastdev
Type: Rust CLI (cargo subcommand)
Summary: Fast Rust dev loop: doctor/init/watch + wrappers for cargo check/test/run with opt-in fast env settings.

Run:
- cargo fastdev doctor
- cargo fastdev init --print
- cargo fastdev init --write --use-sccache --use-mold
- cargo fastdev watch check
- cargo fastdev watch test
- cargo fastdev check
- cargo fastdev run -- <cargo args>

Outputs:
- doctor supports --format text|json (json is stable contract)

Exit codes:
- 0 ok
- 1 error or checks failed

Contracts:
- JSON output should be additive-only in v0.x
- no silent project modification unless --write is used
